content: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin                                                                                                  COREMULTICHAIN Springing to Life: The Rebirth After Winter's Embrace ❄️✅1️⃣ Main Net Launch: Validator Status Application & Node OperationsThe moment has finally come to officially launch our Main Net. Before to the official launch, there will be a 21-day window to apply for full validator status, which will allow you to access the main net privately for docking & wallet synchronization. The launch will take three weeks, commencing on March 30th, & will continue until all essential nodes are completely operational.2️⃣ Token Conversion and Staking Bonuses for CMCX HoldersUsers who hold CMCX on other chains (BEP-20, TRC-20, ERC-20) can convert their CMCX Tokens to the CMCX coin without paying any fees on the CMCX Network via the CMCX Automated Bridge, & users who staked on our BEP-20 Staking prior to the launch of the Main net will receive additional bonuses & exciting privileges.3️⃣ Community-Driven Project: DAO Activation and Active Wallets GoalThe final stage toward becoming a completely community-driven project is DAO activation, which will occur after we have 15,000 active wallets on our main net.With the coin market cap ranking updates Scheduled, the change from token to coin will also occur.4️⃣ Comprehensive Branding Makeover to Distinguish from ImitatorsFurthermore, CORE will undergo a comprehensive branding makeover, including a new website & logo, as well as other related items, in order to be prepared for a massive marketing attempt to respond to concerns about other projects that are imitating CORE branding & concept.5️⃣ Release of Desktop Wallet and Browser Extension for Major ChainsAnother update is the release of a desktop wallet for Mac & Windows that supports all major coins & tokens.The next unexpected product is our full-featured browser extension, which can quickly replace Metamask & support all major chains while transforming the web3.0 space.Our Android wallet, as well as the yet-to-be-released iOS wallet, have been completely redesigned.6️⃣ Upcoming Web3.0 Gaming and Entertainment PortalIn addition, we are preparing our widely anticipated (Formerly Code Named Gravity Project) unique and engaging Web3.0 Gaming And Entertainment Portal for the main net within the next quarter, once our mainnet is stable and has at least 10,000 active wallets.7️⃣ Future-Proofing for Market Conditions: Key Product Launches and UpdatesWe made certain that all key products were launched in accordance with market conditions in order to benefit our fellow backers who helped us throughout this transitional phase.8️⃣ Roadmap: Our schedule for the upcoming quarter is as follows:March 30, 2023: Soft Launch of MainNetMarch 31, 2023: Validator Portal Opens - Nomination and Voting System EnabledApril 14, 2023: CORE Desktop Wallet Beta - MacOSApril 20, 2023: Announcement of RebrandingApril 21, 2023: Main Net Fully Operational (Date may vary based on Node Operators Status and Final Security Checks Results)April 27, 2023: CMCX Bridge Public AccessApril 30, 2023: CORE Desktop Wallet Beta Release - WindowsMay 7, 2023: Release of Browser Extension BetaMay 15, 2023: CORE Wallet Redesign revealMay 17, 2023: CORE Wallet iOS Beta ReleasedMay 21, 2023: On-Chain Governance (DAO Launch)June 1, 2023: Launch of CORE BadgesJune 7, 2023: Launch of Web3.0 Entertainment and Gaming PortalJune 15, 2023: Launch of Academy V2 (Full Version)Let us build the Future
